title: I bought the wrong champion with RP
body: please tell me i can refund...

replies.body:
As *Wolfess* mentioned, utilizing a refund token is how refunds are taken care of for accidental purchases. If you go to the store, then hit *Account*, then *Purchase History*, you should be able to see your number of refund tokens available.

For more information on how to refund content, check out our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) Let me know if you have any questions.

Everyone has 3 refunds.
if you go into the store and look at your history, you should be able to get a refund if you haven't already used them all.
